name: Network Facility Requirement
title: NFR
definition: Indicates that the customerâ€™s desired due date cannot be met because additional provider facilities are required to fulfill the request.
usageNotes: Required on the initial confirmation notice when a need for additional facilities is identified and will cause the DD to be greater than the DDD field on the ASR Form, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: Examples of provider facilities may include fiber builds, card installation, etc.
